org.stepmod
Class CmRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.stepmod.CmRecord

public class CmRecord
extends java.lang.Object

The CmRecord maintains a record of all the releases (CMRelease) for a given STEPmod part. The releases are first read from the cm_record.xml file. New releases for the part can be created by invoking the operation mkCmRelease on the relevant STEPmod part. The CmRecord file is updated by invoking the updateCmRecordFile operation.

readCmRecord

writeCmRecord

public void writeCmRecord()
Creates a new cm_record.xml file for the part. It overwrites the existing file.

makeCmRelease

public CmRelease makeCmRelease()
Create a new release for the part CmRelease Note - a release must be explicitly written to the cm_record.xml file by writing the record invoking the updateCmRecordFile on the StepmodPart

Returns:
the CmRelese object that has been created.
